item.title: 2501.14681-Mukhanov-Sasaki方程的力学类比
item.description:
Sec2.2 力学类比

广义上来说只要 $u_k ^{\prime \prime} + (k^2-\frac{z ^{\prime \prime}}{z})u_k =0 $ 中的 $ \frac{z ^{\prime \prime}}{z}$ 发生较为剧烈变化就能够在某些$k$处的功率谱振荡。

  • 简要推导：

    对于Mukhanov-Sasaki方程，设$u_k = r_k e^{i\theta_k}, r_k,\theta_k$都含共形时间$\tau$，则有

    $$ \begin{aligned} &\text{Real:} ~ r_k ^{\prime \prime} + (k^2-\frac{z ^{\prime \prime}}{z}-\theta_k'^2)r_k = 0 ~ ,\\ &\text{Imaginary:}~ 2r_k'\theta_k'+r_k'\theta_k ^{\prime \prime}= 0 ~ \Rightarrow ~ r_k^2\theta_k' = L \end{aligned} $$

    虚部方程类似于旋转系统中的角动量守恒，对于Bunch-Davies vacuum，$u_k \sim \frac{1}{\sqrt{2k}}e^{-ik\tau}$，那么

    $$ r_k = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2k}},\quad \theta_k' = -k,\quad L = -\frac{1}{2}~. $$

    那么初始由Bunch-Davies vacuum 演化的扰动模始终满足

    $$ \theta_k' = - \frac{1}{2r_k^2}~. $$

    取$V_k = \frac{1}{2}(k^2 - \frac{z ^{\prime \prime}}{z})r_k^2 + \frac{1}{8r_k^2} $，那么$r_k$的演化方程可以写为

    $$ r_k'' + V_{r_k}'(r_k) = 0 $$

    由于$V_k(r_k)$中$z ^{\prime \prime}/z$显含时间，那么可以认为这个（等价的）旋转系统的能量不守恒，且在$r_k \to 0$时势能发散，这表明功率谱永不消逝(角动量始终存在).

    1. 当扰动模处于 Sub-Horizon时， $k^2$ 主导演化， $z ^{\prime \prime}/z$ 是次要的影响，那么当

      • $z ^{\prime \prime}/z $缓慢变化时，$ r_k $ 绝热地趋向于$V(r_k)$的极小值点 $r_k^{min} $演化，没有明显的振荡。

      • $z ^{\prime \prime}/z$剧烈变化时，方程可以改为$r_k ^{\prime \prime} + 4k^2(r-\frac{1}{\sqrt{2k}}) = 0$，$r_k$会在$\frac{1}{2k}$附近振荡，也就是

        $$ r_k -\frac{1}{\sqrt{2k}} \propto \sin(2k(\tau-\tau_0)+\varphi_0) $$

        这里初始相位随着$k$线性增长，也就是在功率谱上有振荡的表现，周期为$-\pi/2\tau_0$.

        新方程的推导：

        $$ \begin{aligned} r_k'' + V_{r_k}'(r_k) &= 0 \Rightarrow r_k'' + V_{r_k r_k}''(\frac{1}{\sqrt{2k}})(r_k-\frac{1}{\sqrt{2k}})= 0 ~,\\ V_{r_k r_k}''(\frac{1}{\sqrt{2k}}) &= (k^2 - \frac{z''}{z}) + \frac{3}{4}r_k^{-4} \\ &\simeq 4k^2\\ \Rightarrow r_k'' + & 4k^2(r_k - \frac{1}{\sqrt{2k}}) = 0 \end{aligned} $$

    2. 当扰动模退出视界，也就是$k\tau \simeq -1$时，$z ^{\prime \prime}/z$在势能$V_k$中取主导作用，这会导致

      $$ r_k'' - \frac{z''}{z}r_k = 0,\quad \frac{r_k''}{r_k} = \frac{z''}{z}~. $$

      扰动模$\gamma \propto r_k/z \sim Const$.

格林函数

对于微分方程：

$$ \hat{L} u(\tau) = f(\tau)~, $$

其中 $\hat{L}$ 是微分算子，$u(\tau)$ 是待解函数，$f(\tau)$ 是已知的任意函数，设格林函数$G(\tau, \tau^\prime)$满足

$$ \hat{L}G(\tau,\tau') = \delta(\tau-\tau')~, $$

那么有

$$ \begin{aligned} &\int \hat{L}G(\tau,\tau')f(\tau')\mathrm{d}\tau' = \int \delta(\tau-\tau')f(\tau')\mathrm{d}\tau' = f(\tau)~, \\ & \Rightarrow \hat{L} \int G(\tau,\tau')f(\tau')\mathrm{d}\tau' = f(\tau)~,\\ & \Rightarrow u(\tau) = \int G(\tau,\tau')f(\tau')\mathrm{d}\tau'~. \end{aligned} $$

对于Mukhanov-Sasaki 方程，扰动模式 $k$ 在经历 Transition 后退出视界，在 Transition 阶段时仍在视界内，故$ k^2 $起主导作用，这时把 $z ^{\prime \prime}/z $ 当作小量处理：

$$ u_k''+k^2 u_k = \frac{z''}{z}u_k~. $$

方程的其次解有

$$ u_{1,\text{sub}}^{(0)} (\tau) = e^{ik\tau}~, \quad u_{2,\text{sub}}^{(0)} (\tau) = e^{-ik\tau}~. $$

用格林函数给出方程的特解

$$ u_s(\tau) = -\frac{1}{2ki}\int_{\tau_\text{I}}^\tau \mathrm{d}\tau' ~ G_{\text{sub}}(\tau,\tau')u_k(\tau')\frac{z''}{z}(\tau')~. $$

由格林函数需要满足

$$ G''(\tau,\tau')+k^2G(\tau,\tau') = \delta(\tau-\tau')~, $$

可以解出

$$ G_{\text{sub}}(\tau,\tau') = \theta(\tau-\tau') 2i \frac{\sin\left( k(\tau-\tau')\right) }{k}~. $$

  • 解的验证，根据二阶微分方程的参数变异法，对于一般的非齐次二阶微分方程

    $$ y'' + p(x)y' + Q(x) y = R(x)~, $$

    有通解（请看参数变异法）

    $$ y_p(x) = u_1(x)y_1(x)+ u_2(x)y_2(x)~. $$

    其中$y_1(x), y_2(x) $ 是二阶微分方程$y ^{\prime \prime}+p(x)y^\prime+Q(x)y = 0$ 的齐次解，$u_1, u_2$的形式如下

    $$ u_1(x) = - \int\frac{y_2}{W_{y_1 y_2}}R(x)\mathrm{d}x ~,\quad u_2(x) = \int\frac{y_1}{W_{y_1 y_2}}R(x)\mathrm{d}x~, $$

    这里$W_{y_1 y_2} = y_1 y_2^\prime -y_2 y_1^\prime $ .

    对于格林函数满足 $G ^{\prime \prime}(\tau,\tau^\prime)+k^2G(\tau,\tau^\prime) = \delta(\tau-\tau^\prime)$，其有齐次解

    $$ u_{1,\text{sub}}^{(0)} (\tau) = e^{ik\tau}~, \quad u_{2,\text{sub}}^{(0)} (\tau) = e^{-ik\tau}~. $$

    且 $W_{12} = -2ik$ ，那么对于 $G_{\text{sub}}(\tau,\tau^\prime) = G(\tau,\tau^\prime)/W_{12}$ 有

    $$ \begin{aligned} G_{\text{sub}}(\tau,\tau')&=-e^{ik\tau}\int e^{-ik\tau} \delta(\tau-\tau')\mathrm{d}\tau + e^{-ik\tau}\int e^{ik\tau} \delta(\tau-\tau')\mathrm{d}\tau\\ & = -e^{ik\tau} e^{-ik\tau'}\theta(\tau-\tau') + e^{-ik\tau} e^{ik\tau'}\theta(\tau-\tau')\\ &=\theta(\tau-\tau') \left(e^{ik(\tau'-\tau)}-e^{-ik(\tau'-\tau)} \right)\\ & = \theta(\tau-\tau')2i\sin(\tau'-\tau)~. \end{aligned} $$

参数变异法

​ 对于一般的非齐次二阶微分方程 $y ^{\prime \prime} + p(x)y^\prime + Q(x) y = R(x)$的通解$y_p$ , 其导数为：

$$ \begin{aligned} y_p' &= u_1' y_1 + u_1 y_1' + u_2' y_2 + u_2 y_2'~, \\ y_p'' & = u_1'' y_1 + 2 u_1' y_1' + u_1 y_1'' + u_2'' y_2 + 2 u_2' y_2' + u_2 y_2''~, \end{aligned} $$

​ 令 $ u_1^\prime y_1 + u_2^\prime y_2 = 0$，由于 $y_1,y_2$ 本身是齐次解，那么把 $y_p$ 代入到微分方程中,

  1. $y_p ^{\prime \prime}$中的$y_1 ^{\prime \prime}, y_2 ^{\prime \prime}$项会被消去，同时对$ u_1^\prime y_1 + u_2^\prime y_2 = 0$求导可得$u_1 ^{\prime \prime}y_1 + u_1^\prime y_1^\prime + u_2 ^{\prime \prime}y_2 + u_2^\prime y_2^\prime = 0$，最终只留下$u_1^\prime y_1^\prime +u_2^\prime y_2^\prime $.

  2. $y_p^\prime $ 由于 $ u_1^\prime y_1 + u_2^\prime y_2 = 0$ 同时 $y_1^\prime , y_2^\prime $ 被消去则没有留下来的项，

  3. $y_p $ 项中没有能够留下来的，

  4. 最终剩下 $ u_1^\prime y_1^\prime +u_2^\prime y_2^\prime = R(x)$ .

​ 需要求解的方程变为

$$ u_1' y_1 + u_2' y_2 = 0 ~, \quad u_1' y_1' + u_2' y_2' = R(x) ~. $$

​ 由此代入

$$ u_1(x) = - \int\frac{y_2}{W_{y_1 y_2}}R(x)\mathrm{d}x ~,\quad u_2(x) = \int\frac{y_1}{W_{y_1 y_2}}R(x)\mathrm{d}x~, $$

​ 发现两个方程都满足。所以最终通解为 ​

$$ y_p(x) = u_1(x)y_1(x)+ u_2(x)y_2(x)~. $$

item.title: 标量诱导引力波
item.description:
标量诱导引力波

一般的诱导引力波产生于Inflation结束和BBN之间，在原初扰动重新进入视界的时刻。诱导引力波有很多种，但目前认为标量诱导引力波是其最主要的部分。

引力波能谱

对于引力波，我们观测的是它的能谱，它是一个无量纲量：

$$ \Omega_{\text{GW}} = \frac{1}{3 M_{\text{P}}H^2}\frac{\mathrm{d}\rho_{\text{GW}} }{\mathrm{d} \ln k } = \frac{k^2}{12 a^2 H^2}\sum_\lambda \mathscr{P}_{h,\lambda}(k) $$

其中$H = \dot{a}/a$为哈勃参数，$\lambda = +,\times$为极化分量的指标，$\mathscr{P}_{h,\lambda}$是引力波的功率谱

$$ \langle h_{\boldsymbol{k},\lambda} h_{-\boldsymbol{k},\lambda} \rangle = \frac{2\pi^2}{k^3} \mathscr{P}_{h,\lambda}(k)~， $$

其中$h_{ij}$为引力波，$h_{\boldsymbol{k},\lambda}$为其傅里叶变换

$$ h_{i j}(\tau, \mathbf{k})=\sum_{\lambda} \int \frac{d^{3} k}{(2 \pi)^{3}} e_{i j}^{\lambda}(\mathbf{k}) h_{\mathbf{k}, \lambda}(\tau) e^{i \mathbf{k} \mathbf{x}}~, $$

这里$e_{i j}^{\lambda}(\mathbf{k})$是极化张量，定义为

$$ \begin{aligned} e_{ij}^+({\mathbf{k}}) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} [e_i(\mathbf{k})e_j(\mathbf{k}) - \bar{e}_{i}(\mathbf{k})\bar{e}_j(\mathbf{k}) ]\\ e_{ij}^+({\mathbf{k}}) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} [e_i(\mathbf{k})\bar{e}_j(\mathbf{k}) + \bar{e}_{i}(\mathbf{k})e_j(\mathbf{k}) ] \end{aligned} $$

写成便于理解的形式：

$$ e_{ij} = \begin{bmatrix} 0 & & & \\ & 1 &0 & \\ & 0 & -1 & \\ & & &0 \end{bmatrix} \to h^+ ~, \quad \bar{e}_{ij} = \begin{bmatrix} 0 & & & \\ & 0 & 1 & \\ & 1 & 0 & \\ & & &0 \end{bmatrix} \to h^\times ~. $$

Action与EoM

度规形式与作用量

对于度规：

$$ \mathrm{d}s^2 = -e^{2\Psi} \mathrm{d}t^2 + a^2(t) e^{2\Phi}Y_{ij}\mathrm{d}x^i\mathrm{d}x^j ~, $$

其中$\mathrm{det} Y =1$，作用量$S = \int\mathrm{d}^4 x\sqrt{-g}[\frac{1}{2}R-\frac{1}{2}g^{\mu\nu}\partial_\mu \varphi\partial_\nu \varphi - V(\varphi)] $可以展开为

$$ \begin{aligned} S = \int\mathrm{d}^3 x \mathrm{d}t \{ ae^{\Psi+\Phi}&(\frac{1}{2}R^{(3)}[Y_{ij}] - 2Y^{ij}D_iD_j\Phi - Y^{ij}D_i\Phi D_j \Phi - \frac{1}{2}D_i\varphi D_j \varphi )\\ &+a^3 e^{3\Phi - \Psi}(\frac{1}{8}Y^{ij}Y^{kl}\dot{Y}_{ik}\dot{Y}_{jl} - 3(H+\dot{\Phi})^2 +\frac{1}{2}\dot{\varphi}^2 )\\ &-a^3e^{3\Phi+\Psi}V(\varphi) \}~. \end{aligned} $$

其中$D_i$为三维的协变导数。

微扰作用量

在对$Y_{ij}$进行变分之前，为保持其横向无迹的性质，对$Y_{ij}$采取指数的形式进行展开

$$ Y_{ij} = (e^h)_{ij} = \delta_{ij} + h_{ij} + \frac{1}{2}\delta^{kl}h_{ik}h_{jl} + \mathscr{O}(h^3)~, $$

由此空间部分的指标可以用$\delta_{ij}$进行升降，三维曲率标量在这种形式下为

$$ R^{(3)}[e^h] = -\frac{1}{4}\partial_i h_{kl}\partial^i h^{kl} + \mathscr{O}(h^3)~. $$

对于含微扰的变量，有：

$$ \Psi = \Psi(t,\mathbf{x})~, ~\Phi = \Phi(t,\mathbf{x})~,~\varphi = \bar{\varphi}(t) + \delta\varphi(t,\mathbf{x})~, $$

其中$\bar{\varphi}(t)$是背景，其他都是微扰项。对于无各向异性压力的情况下，有

$$ \Phi + \Psi = 0~. $$

根据以上，含有二阶作用量的项为：

$$ \begin{aligned} \frac{1}{2}R^{(3)}[Y^{ij}] &\to -\frac{1}{8}\partial_i h_{kl}\partial^i h^{kl}~,\\ -Y^{ij}D_i\Phi D_j \Phi &\to h^{ij}\partial_i\Phi\partial_j\Phi~,\\ -\frac{1}{2}Y^{ij}D_i\varphi D_j \varphi& \to \frac{1}{2}h^{ij}\partial_i \delta\varphi \partial_j \delta \varphi~,\\ \frac{1}{8}Y^{ij}Y^{kl}\dot{Y}_{ik}\dot{Y}_{jl}&\to \frac{1}{8}\dot{h}^{ij}\dot{h}_{ij}~. \end{aligned} $$

得到展开后的作用量为

$$ S = \int d^3 x \, dt \left\{ \frac{a^3}{8} h^{ij} h_{ij} - \frac{a}{8} \partial_i h_{kl} \partial^i h^{kl} + a h^{ij} \partial_i \Phi \partial_j \Phi + \frac{a}{2} h^{ij} \partial_i \delta \varphi \partial_j \delta \varphi \right\}~ , $$

对$h_{ij}$进行变分后，得到运动方程

$$ \dot{h}_{ij} + 3 H \dot{h}_{ij} - a^{-2} \Delta h_{ij} = a^{-2} {\cal P}^{ab}_{~ ~ ~ ~ij} \left\{ 4 \partial_{a} \Phi \partial_{b} \Phi + 2 \partial_{a} \delta \varphi \partial_{b} \delta \varphi \right\} \, , $$

其中${\cal P}^{ab}_{~ ~ ~ ~ij}$是投影算子，把张量从$ab$分量投影到$ij$分量上。

傅里叶空间的运动方程

根据动量的限制关系，有

$$ \delta \varphi = - \sqrt{\frac{2}{\epsilon}} (\Phi + \frac{\Phi'}{\mathcal{H}})~, $$

因此我们只有一个标量自由度，经过傅里叶变换

$$ \Phi(\tau,\mathbf{k}) = \int \frac{\mathrm{d}^3 k}{(2\pi)^3} \Phi_{\mathbf{k}}(\tau)e^{i\mathbf{kx}}~, $$

可以把$\Phi_{\mathbf{k}}$分解成

$$ \Phi(\mathbf{k},\tau) = T_\Phi(k,\tau)\Phi_{\mathbf{k}}~, $$

其中$\Phi_{\mathbf{k}}$为原初扰动在超视界尺度的值，$T_\Phi(k,\tau)$为转移函数。

在傅里叶空间中，运动方程可以写为

$$ h_{\mathbf{k},\lambda}'' + 2\mathcal{H}h_{\mathbf{k},\lambda}' + k^2 h_{\mathbf{k},\lambda} = S_{\mathbf{k},\lambda}~. $$

其中有

$$ \begin{aligned} \mathcal{S}_{\mathbf{k},\lambda} = 4 \int \frac{\mathrm{d}^3q}{(2\pi)^3} &e^{\imath j}_\lambda(k) q_i q_j \Phi_{\mathbf{q}} \Phi_{|\mathbf{k}-\mathbf{q}|} f(\tau, q, |\mathbf{k}-\mathbf{q}|)~,\\ f(\tau, q, |\mathbf{k} - \mathbf{q}|) =& ~ T_{\Phi}(q\tau)T_{\Phi}(|\mathbf{k} - \mathbf{q}|\tau)\\ & + \frac{2}{3(1+w) }\left(T_{\Phi}(q\tau) + \frac{T'_{\Phi}(q\tau)}{\mathcal{H}}\right)\left(T_{\Phi}(|\mathbf{k} - \mathbf{q}|\tau) + \frac{T'_{\Phi}(|\mathbf{k} - \mathbf{q}|\tau)}{\mathcal{H}}\right)~, \end{aligned} $$

这里的$w = P/\rho$为状态方程的参数。

关联函数的计算

对于引力波的两点关联函数

$$ \langle h_{\lambda}(k, \tau) h_{\lambda}(k', \tau) \rangle = \int_{0}^{\tau} \mathrm{d}\tau_1 \int_{0}^{\tau} \mathrm{d}\tau_2 G(\tau, \tau_1) G(\tau, \tau_2) \langle S_{\lambda}(k, \tau_1) S_{\lambda}(k', \tau_2) \rangle ~, $$

其中$G(\tau,\tau_a),a=1,2$是格林函数，形式为

$$ G(\tau,\tau') = \frac{1}{W(h_1,h_2,\tau')}\left(h_1(\tau)h_2(\tau')-h_1(\tau')h_2(\tau)\right)~, $$

这里$h_1,h_2$是方程$h_{\mathbf{k},\lambda}^{\prime\prime} + 2\mathcal{H}h_{\mathbf{k},\lambda}^\prime + k^2 h_{\mathbf{k},\lambda} =0$的两个齐次解，$W(h_1,h_2,\tau) = h_1^\prime (\tau)h_2(\tau)-h_1(\tau)h_2^\prime (\tau)$。标量场作为波源可以进一步展开：

$$ \begin{aligned} \langle S_{\lambda}(k, \tau_1) S_{\lambda}(k', \tau_2) \rangle &= 4^2\int\frac{\mathrm{d}^3 q}{(2\pi)^3}\frac{\mathrm{d}^3 q'}{(2\pi)^3} e^{ij}_{\lambda} (k)e^{ij}_{\lambda}(k')q_i q_j \\ &\quad\quad \times f(\tau_1,q,|\mathbf{k}-\mathbf{q}|)f(\tau_2,q',|\mathbf{k}'-\mathbf{q}'|)\\ &\quad\quad \times \langle\Phi_q \Phi_{|\mathbf{k}-\mathbf{q}|}\Phi_{q'} \Phi_{|\mathbf{k}'-\mathbf{q}'|} \rangle ~, \end{aligned} $$

这里暂时不考虑原初扰动的非高斯性，标量扰动的四点关联函数为

$$ \begin{aligned} \langle\Phi_q \Phi_{|\mathbf{k}-\mathbf{q}|}\Phi_{q'} \Phi_{|\mathbf{k}'-\mathbf{q}'|} \rangle &= \langle\Phi_q \Phi_{|\mathbf{k}-\mathbf{q}|}\rangle\langle \Phi_{q'} \Phi_{|\mathbf{k}'-\mathbf{q}'|} \rangle + \langle\Phi_q \Phi_{q'}\rangle\langle \Phi_{|\mathbf{k}-\mathbf{q}|} \Phi_{|\mathbf{k}'-\mathbf{q}'|} \rangle + \langle\Phi_q \Phi_{|\mathbf{k}'-\mathbf{q}'|}\rangle\langle \Phi_{|\mathbf{k}-\mathbf{q}|} \Phi_{q'} \rangle \\ & = \frac{2\pi^2}{q^3}\mathscr{P}_\Phi(q) \frac{2\pi^2}{q'^3} \mathscr{P}_\Phi(q') \times (2\pi)^6\delta^{(3)}(\mathbf{k})\delta^{(3)}(\mathbf{k}')\\ &\quad+ \frac{2\pi^2}{q^3}\mathscr{P}_\Phi(q) \frac{2\pi^2}{|\mathbf{k}-\mathbf{q}|^3} \mathscr{P}_\Phi(|\mathbf{k}-\mathbf{q}|) \times (2\pi)^6\delta^{(3)}(\mathbf{q}+\mathbf{q}')\delta^{(3)}(\mathbf{k}+\mathbf{k}'-\mathbf{q}-\mathbf{q}')\\ &\quad+\frac{2\pi^2}{q^3}\mathscr{P}_\Phi(q) \frac{2\pi^2}{|\mathbf{k}-\mathbf{q}|^3} \mathscr{P}_\Phi(|\mathbf{k}-\mathbf{q}|) \times (2\pi)^6\delta^{(3)}(\mathbf{q}+\mathbf{k}'-\mathbf{q}')\delta^{(3)}(\mathbf{k}+\mathbf{q}-\mathbf{q}')~. \end{aligned} $$

用Dirac符号内的动量积分，最终在动量球坐标中，标量诱导引力波的功率谱为

$$ \overline{\mathcal{P}}_{h}=8 \int_{0}^{\infty} d v \int_{|1 - v|}^{1 + v} d u\left(\frac{4 v^{2}-\left(1 - u^{2}+v^{2}\right)^{2}}{4 u v}\right)^{2} \overline{I^{2}(\tau, k, v, u)} \mathcal{P}_{\Phi}(k u) \mathcal{P}_{\Phi}(k v) $$

其中

$$ v = \frac{q}{k},\quad u = \frac{|\mathbf{k}-\mathbf{q}|}{k}~. $$

此外，$\overline{\mathcal{P}}_{h}$中对于时间的依赖性全部在传递函数(transfer function)中:

$$ I(\tau,k,u,v) = \int^\tau_{\tau_i}\mathrm{d}\bar{\tau} G(\tau,\bar{\tau})f(\bar{\tau},k,u,v)~. $$

这样就得到了功率谱。

item.title: 论文笔记-strong_coupling
item.description:
The strong coupling problem

Genesis asymptotics: $t \to -\infty $, Universe$ \to $ flat spacetime, energy density $\rho = 0$.

During Genesis: a NECV stage, energy density grow, $E_{class}\propto (-t)^{-1}$.

Later stage, radiated dominated or genesis complements the inflationary scenario.

The Lagrangian:

$$ \mathcal{L} = G_2(\phi,X)-G_3(\phi,X)\Box\phi + G_4(\phi)R, $$

where $X = -\frac{1}{2}g^{\mu\nu}\partial_\mu \phi\partial_\nu \phi$.

Metric:

$$ \mathrm{d}s^2 = -N^2\mathrm{d}t^2+\gamma_{ij}(\mathrm{d}x^i + N^j \mathrm{d}t),\quad \gamma_{ij} = a^2 \mathrm{e}^{2\zeta}(\mathrm{e}^h)_{ij}. $$

Two-order analysis

Genesis tensor quadratic actions:

$$ S_{hh} = \int \mathrm{d}t\mathrm{d}^3 x N \frac{a^3}{8}(\mathcal{G}_T\frac{\dot{h}_{ij}}{N^2}-\frac{\mathcal{F}_T}{a^2}h_{ij,k}h_{ij,k}). $$

NECV metric:

$$ \mathrm{d}s^2 = -N^2\mathrm{d}t^2+h_{ij}(\mathrm{d}x^i + N^j \mathrm{d}t),\quad h_{ij} = a^2 \mathrm{e}^{2\zeta}(\mathrm{e}^\gamma)_{ij}. $$

NECV tensor quadratic actions:

$$ S_\gamma^{(2)} = \frac{M_p^2}{8}\int\mathrm{d}^4 x a^3 Q_T (\dot{\gamma}_{ij}^2 - c_T^2 \frac{(\partial_k \gamma_{ij})^2}{a^2}) $$

We can obtain

$$ M_p^2 Q_T = \mathcal{G}_T/N, \quad M_p^2 c_T^2 Q_T = N \mathcal{F}_T. $$

In the early time (Genesis), there are asymptotics

$$ \begin{split} \mathcal{F}_T \propto (-t)^{-2\alpha},\quad &\mathcal{G}_T\propto (-t)^{-2\alpha} \\ \mathcal{F}_S \propto (-t)^{-2\alpha+\delta},\quad &\mathcal{G}_S\propto (-t)^{-2\alpha+\delta}\\ \Theta\propto t^{-2\alpha-\delta-1} \end{split} $$

as $t\to - \infty$, and $\Theta = \Theta (\phi,N,G_3,G_4,G_5, X,H) $ .

The effective gravitational constant

$$ \begin{split} G_{eff} &= \frac{(\dot{\Theta }+ H\Theta)\mathcal{F}_S + (\dot{\mathcal{G}}_T - \dot{\Theta} \mathcal{G}_T/\Theta)^2}{\Theta^2 \mathcal{F}_S}\\ &\Rightarrow G_{eff}\propto t^{2\alpha+\delta} \end{split} $$

In the natural units $c=1$, $[G] = 1/M^2 = E^{-2}$, We find that the energy scale associated with interaction of nonrelativistic sources is actually of order $G_{eff}^{-1/2}\propto t^{-\alpha-\delta/2} $. we need $E_{strong}\gg E_{class}$, and we can obtain a stronger bound

$$ \alpha+\delta/2<1 $$

If $\alpha+\delta/2=0$, the $G_{eff}$ degrade to constant, that is apparently satisfied the requirement.

Third-order analysis (Only tensor)

The Lagrangian involving three tensors was derived in Ref[ arXiv:1108.3513]:

$$ \mathcal{L}_{h h h}=a^{3}\left[\frac{\mu}{12 N^{3}} \dot{h}_{i j} \dot{h}_{j k} \dot{h}_{k i}+\frac{\mathcal{F}_{T}}{4 a^{2}}\left(h_{i k} h_{j l}-\frac{1}{2} h_{i j} h_{k l}\right) h_{i j, k l}\right], $$

In the genesis model $G_5=0 \Rightarrow\mu=\dot{\phi}XG_{5X} = 0$, so only one term

$$ \frac{\mathcal{F}_{T}}{4 a^{2}}\left(h_{i k} h_{j l}-\frac{1}{2} h_{i j} h_{k l}\right) h_{i j, k l} $$

is need to analysis.

We can introduce canonically normalized tensor perturbation

$$ q_{ij} = \sqrt{\mathcal{G}_T} h_{ij}\propto (-t)^{-\alpha} h_{ij} , $$

the term can be schematically written as

$$ \mathbb{L}_{h h h} \propto \mathcal{F}_{T} \cdot\left(2 \mathcal{G}_{T}\right)^{-3 / 2} \cdot q^{3} \cdot\left(\partial_{t}\right)^{0} \cdot(\partial)^{2} . $$

The dimension of coefficient $\mathcal{F}_T \cdot(2 \mathcal{G}_T)^{-3 / 2}$ is 1-2=-1 ,

So the energy associated with $\mathbb{L}_{h h h} $ is

$$ \begin{split} E_{strong}^{hhh}& \propto (\mathcal{F}_T \cdot (2\mathcal{G}_T)^{-3/2})^\frac{1}{-1}\propto(-t)^{-\alpha}\gg (-t)^{-1}\\ &\Rightarrow \alpha<1 \end{split} $$

参考：arXiv:2003.01202
